meanings.definition: A hypothetical particle with the same mass as an atom but with opposite charge.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the antiatom to understand its unique properties.
meanings.sent2: The concept of an antiatom challenges traditional atomic theory.
meanings.sent3: The antiatom walked into the atomic bar, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an antiatom, attracting attention with its unconventional ideas.
meanings.sent5: In the world of antiatoms, opposites truly do attract.

meanings.definition: A particle composed of antiprotons and positrons.
meanings.sent1: The collision created an antiatom in the particle accelerator.
meanings.sent2: Antiatoms play a crucial role in understanding antimatter.
meanings.sent3: The antiproton and positron decided to team up and form an antiatom.
meanings.sent4: His words were like an antiatom, disrupting the peaceful conversation.
meanings.sent5: The antiatom shimmered with potential energy, ready to interact with matter.
